#id=1
#text=This afternoon , I headed to my neighborhood supermarket to buy groceries .
#id=2
#text=Luckily , the place was only a block away from my apartment and basically right next door to me .
#id=3
#text=It was a bit chilly outside , so I put on a jacket and my shopping bag , then quickly wrote down a grocery items .
#id=4
#text=I walked my way to the supermarket and then got a hold of a shopping basket .
#id=5
#text=My first stop was the produce section , where I picked up some produce like bell peppers , onions , and garlic .
#id=6
#text=Next , I headed to the dairy section , where I got a pack of Gouda cheese and a liter container of milk .
#id=7
#text=My next stop was one of the supermarket 's middle aisles to get a box of pasta and tomato sauce .
#id=8
#text=I had found everything I needed for the week , so I went over to the checkout counters .
#id=9
#text=This was a bit of a wait , as the store was pretty packed with shoppers .
#text=Fortunately , I found a line that was relatively less crowded .
#text=A few minutes later , I placed my items onto the checkout aisle and had them scanned .
#text=The checkout clerk then ran up my total , after which I paid with my debit card and placed my groceries into my shopping bag .
#text=Once I was all set , I headed back to my apartment .
